name: api_rendering_Camera
description: A Camera is a device through which the player views the world.

properties.name: activeTexture
properties.description: Gets the temporary RenderTexture target for this Camera.

properties.name: actualRenderingPath
properties.description: The rendering path that is currently being used (Read Only).

properties.name: allowDynamicResolution
properties.description: Dynamic Resolution Scaling.

properties.name: allowHDR
properties.description: High dynamic range rendering.

properties.name: allowMSAA
properties.description: MSAA rendering.

properties.name: anamorphism
properties.description: The camera anamorphism. To use this property, enable UsePhysicalProperties.

properties.name: aperture
properties.description: The camera aperture. To use this property, enable UsePhysicalProperties.

properties.name: areVRStereoViewMatricesWithinSingleCullTolerance
properties.description: Determines whether the stereo view matrices are suitable to allow for a single pass cull.

properties.name: aspect
properties.description: The aspect ratio (width divided by height).

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.description: The color with which the screen will be cleared.

properties.name: barrelClipping
properties.description: The camera barrel clipping. To use this property, enable UsePhysicalProperties.

properties.name: bladeCount
properties.description: The blade count in the lens of the camera. To use this property, enable UsePhysicalProperties.

properties.name: cameraToWorldMatrix
properties.description: Matrix that transforms from camera space to world space (Read Only).

properties.name: cameraType
properties.description: Identifies what kind of camera this is, using the CameraType enum.

properties.name: clearFlags
properties.description: How the camera clears the background.

properties.name: clearStencilAfterLightingPass
properties.description: Should the camera clear the stencil buffer after the deferred light pass?

properties.name: commandBufferCount
properties.description: Number of command buffers set up on this camera (Read Only).

properties.name: cullingMask
properties.description: This is used to render parts of the Scene selectively.

properties.name: cullingMatrix
properties.description: Sets a custom matrix for the camera to use for all culling queries.

properties.name: curvature
properties.description: The curvature of the blades. To use this property, enable UsePhysicalProperties.
